text: tatha (allaah) kahegaah tum mere saamane usee prakaar akele aa gaye, jaise tumhen pratham baar hamane paida kiya tha tatha hamane jo kuchh diya tha, apane peechhe (sansaar hee mein) chhod aaye aur aaj ham tumhaare saath, tumhaare abhistaavakon (sifaarishiyon) ko nahin dekh rahe hain, jinake baare mein tumhaara bhram tha ki tumhaare kaamon mein ve (allaah ke) saajhee hain? nishchay tumhaare beech ke sambandh bhang ho gaye hain aur tumhaara sab bhram kho gaya hai
